
```{r}
ggplot(data = bechdelSample, aes(y = budget_2013)) +
  geom_boxplot(fill = "royalblue") + 
  labs(y = "Adjusted budget (USD)", 
       title = "Movie budgets, adjusted for inflation to the 2013 USD")
```
